turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello, how can i assist you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm doing good. I was actually looking to order a pizza from this new pizzeria called Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, how many pizzas would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: All right, well here are the instructions. I would like two pizzas, both of them large. As for toppings, one of them needs to be meat lover's minus the Canadian bacon.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Slower? Okay, sorry. I would like to have two pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so, what size would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: For one of them, I would like Meat Lovers, but minus the Canadian bacon. As for the other, make it half pepperoni, half cheese, extra cheese on both of them.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what type of crust would you like?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so, 2 large pizzas, one meatlovers with no canadian bacon. the second will be half pepperoni, half cheese. thin crust and extra cheese on both. is this correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Are both sizes the pizza large?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Extra cheese and thin crust on both, one of them's Meat Lovers, and the other is half pepperoni, half cheese. So yes, that is correct.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: $31.50. Okay, I can manage that. I appreciate all your hard work.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your pizzas will be ready for pickup at bela luna's soon.
